channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Avaya Aura Devices Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Avaya Aura Devices Services

item.title: CVE-2021-25654|2024-08-03T20:11:28.332Z -- avaya -- avaya%20aura%20devices%20services
item.description: An arbitrary code execution vulnerability was discovered in Avaya Aura Device Services that may potentially allow a local user to execute specially crafted scripts. Affects 7.0 through 8.1.4.0 versions of Avaya Aura Device Services.
